channel.title: Setting playerRights On Both 508 & 317 Servers!
channel.description:
Hello and i'm here to teach you on how to set playerRights on commands, Rights: 0 = Regular Player 1 = Player Moderator 2 = Administrator 3 = Owner/Co-Owner --------------------- For Donator rights this is the code [code]donator == 1[/code] this will make it so only donators can use the command. ------------------------ Now lets get started, ---------------------------- [b]317 Solution:[/b] Simply just put the [code]&& playerRights >= 2) {[/code] Right next to the code [code]if(command.startsWith("food")[/code] And it will turn out like this [code]if(command.startsWith("food") && playerRights >= 2) {[/code] Now under that command put: [code]addItem(392,1000);[/code] - This will add "1000" Noted Manta Rays, And now the final code will turn out like this: [code]if(command.startsWith("food") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(392,1000)[/code] P.S! This will make it so only administrators can use this command! -------------------------- [b]508 Solution:[/b] It's Simple Just Put The [code]&& p.rights > 2) {[/code] Right Next to the code [code]} else if(cmd[0].equals("food")[/code] And it will turn out like this [code]} else if(cmd[0].equals("food") && p.rights > 2) {[/code] Now under that command put: [code]Engine.playerItems.addItem;[/code] - This will add "1000" Noted Manta Rays, And now the final code will turn out like this: [code]if(cmd[0].equals("food") && p.rights >= 2) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(392,1000)[/code] P.S! This will make it so only administrators can use this command! -----------------------------
[b] Credits: Me 100%[/b]

item.title: Setting playerRights On Both 508 & 317 Servers!
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

Hello and i’m here to teach you on how to set playerRights on commands, Rights:
0 = Regular Player
1 = Player Moderator
2 = Administrator
3 = Owner/Co-Owner

For Donator rights this is the code donator == 1 this will make it so only donators can use the command.

Now lets get started,

317 Solution: Simply just put the && playerRights >= 2) { Right next to the code if(command.startsWith("food")
And it will turn out like this if(command.startsWith("food") && playerRights >= 2) {
Now under that command put:

addItem(392,1000); - This will add “1000” Noted Manta Rays,
And now the final code will turn out like this:

if(command.startsWith("food") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(392,1000)
P.S! This will make it so only administrators can use this command!

508 Solution: It’s Simple Just Put The && p.rights > 2) { Right Next to the code } else if(cmd[0].equals("food") And it will turn out like this } else if(cmd[0].equals("food") && p.rights > 2) {
Now under that command put:

Engine.playerItems.addItem; - This will add “1000” Noted Manta Rays,
And now the final code will turn out like this:

if(cmd[0].equals("food") && p.rights >= 2) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(392,1000)
P.S! This will make it so only administrators can use this command!


Credits: Me 100%

Read full topic
